"Very recently I have had direct light from the Lord upon this question, that many Seventh-day Adventists 
                                                                           84
were robbing God in tithes and offerings, and it was plainly revealed to me that Malachi has stated the case as it really is. Then how dare any man even think in his heart that a suggestion to withhold tithes and offerings is from the Lord? Where, my brother, have you stepped out of the path? O get your feet back in the straight path again." --TM 60.
